creator: christophe.jaillet@wanadoo.fr
text:
Hi,

not sure it is the good place to report, so I apologize if I'm wrong.

While using google I landed at :
    http://httpd.apache.org/bug_report.html

From there, there are 3 links to bugzilla :
    - All bugs fixed in the last 60 days
    - Frequently reported bugs (bugs with duplicates changed in the last 30 days)
    - All bugs changed in the last 10 days

These links are short-cuts to the bugzilla database but the tags in the URL are, IMO, wrong. It is :
   &product=Apache+httpd-1.3&product=Apache+httpd-2.0

It should be only :
   &product=Apache+httpd-2
as it is the only apache product defined in the database nowadays.

best regards

creator: christophe.jaillet@wanadoo.fr
text:
BTW, I should have read till the end of the page.

At the end is written :
   Apache Bug Database. The appropriate Bugzilla projects for Apache HTTPD are "Apache httpd-1.3" and "Apache httpd-2.0".

This should be :
   Apache Bug Database. The appropriate Bugzilla projects for Apache HTTPD is "Apache httpd-2".
*** Bug 52945 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
creator: christophe.jaillet@wanadoo.fr
